about_the_game:
A collection of Forced Vote items including:

“Forced Vote” - Extra right to vote in Judgement Room.
“Forced Vote x2” - Extra right to vote in Judgement Room x2.
“Forced Vote x4” - Extra right to vote in Judgement Room x4.

Use these items via the Setup\Items\DLC sub-menu from the Lobby. For each Forced Vote item used you’ll be entitled to an additional vote during Judgment.
detailed_description:
A collection of Forced Vote items including:

“Forced Vote” - Extra right to vote in Judgement Room.

“Forced Vote x4” - Extra right to vote in Judgement Room x4.

Use these items via the Setup\Items\DLC sub-menu from the Lobby. For each Forced Vote item used you’ll be entitled to an additional vote during Judgment.
name: Lost Dimension: Forced Vote Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
